meanings.definition: Not altered or modified in any way
meanings.sent1: The photo was undoctored, showing the true colors of the sunset.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using undoctored ingredients in her recipes for authenticity.
meanings.sent3: The detective found the undoctored evidence to be the key to solving the case.
meanings.sent4: His undoctored response revealed his true feelings about the situation.
meanings.sent5: The undoctored painting captured the raw beauty of nature perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The document was presented undoctored, exactly as it was found.
meanings.sent2: He insisted on hearing the news undoctored, without any added commentary.
meanings.sent3: The comedian delivered his jokes undoctored, letting the audience enjoy the humor naturally.
meanings.sent4: The music played undoctored, transporting the listeners to another time.
meanings.sent5: The story was told undoctored, preserving its original charm and impact.
